text: Queens of the Stone Age are a rock band from California, USA. They formed in 1997. The band has released five studio albums, three extended plays (EP), fifteen singles and one live/video album. Between 2003 and 2008, they were nominated for the Grammy Award four times. == Studio albums == * Queens of the Stone Age (1998) * Rated R (2000) * Songs for the Deaf (2002) * Lullabies to Paralyze (2005) * Era Vulgaris (2007) * ...Like Clockwork (2013) * Villains (2017) * In Times New Roman... (2023) Category:American rock bands Category:American hard rock bands Category:Musical groups from California
title: Queens of the Stone Age
